class.name: PLATEAUCityModelScene
class.brief_description: Root node for imported PLATEAU city model scenes.
class.description:
PLATEAUCityModelScene serves as the root node for PLATEAU city model imports. It manages GeoReference, imported GML transforms, and provides methods to query and manipulate city objects. Equivalent to Unity's PLATEAUInstancedCityModel. [codeblock] var scene = PLATEAUCityModelScene.new() scene.geo_reference = geo_ref add_child(scene) scene.import_gml("path/to/file.gml", import_options)
# Get latitude/longitude of origin print("Origin: ", scene.latitude, ", ", scene.longitude)
# Get all GML transforms for gml_transform in scene.get_gml_transforms(): print(gml_transform.name) [/codeblock]

method.name: import_gml
method.description: Import a GML file and add as child node. Returns the created transform node, or null on failure.

method.name: import_gml_async
method.description: Async version of import_gml. Emits "gml_imported" signal when done.

method.name: get_gml_transforms
method.description: Get all GML Transform nodes (children that represent imported GML files).

method.name: get_gml_transform
method.description: Get Transform for a specific GML file path.

method.name: get_lods
method.description: Get available LODs for a GML transform.

method.name: get_lod_transforms
method.description: Get LOD transform nodes for a GML transform.

method.name: get_city_objects
method.description: Get all CityObject nodes for a GML transform at specified LOD.

method.name: get_package
method.description: Get package type for a mesh data. Returns a PLATEAUCityModelPackage value.

method.name: get_all_mesh_instances
method.description: Get all mesh instances with PLATEAUMeshData in this scene.

method.name: find_mesh_data_by_gml_id
method.description: Find mesh data by GML ID.

method.name: copy_from
method.description: Copy geo reference from another scene.

method.name: reload_gml
method.description: Reload GML for a transform (re-import with same options).

method.name: remove_gml
method.description: Remove GML transform and its children.

members.member: The geo reference for coordinate conversion.

signal.name: gml_imported
signal.description: Emitted when async GML import completes.
